Description: Cast bronze cat mummy-case in the form of a seated cat, still with remains of a cat mummy within. The body and upper part of the legs bears incised decoration and the eyes were hollowed for inlays. An incised necklace is indicated with a wedjat amulet at the front. On top of the head is an incised scarab. Patches of linen adhere to the exterior and linen-wrapped mummifie remains are visible through holes in the case. The incised decoration may not be original.
Acquisition notes: The Big Number is duplicated with 1849,0615.2
